abstract: Wal-Mart plans to launch its big holiday ad campaign with an upbeat message that elevates saving money from a necessity to a virtue.
snippet: Wal-Mart plans to launch its big holiday ad campaign with an upbeat message that elevates saving money from a necessity to a virtue.
lead_paragraph: THE possibility that consumers will hesitate to spend for the holidays is worrying retailers as the Christmas shopping season gets under way. Wal-Mart, the nation’s No. 1 merchant, is starting its big holiday advertising campaign today with an upbeat appeal that seeks to elevate saving money from a necessity to a virtue.

headline.main: Wal-Mart Wants to Carry Its Christmas Ads Beyond Price
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart Wants to Carry Its Christmas Ads Beyond Price

byline.original: By Stuart Elliott and Michael Barbaro
